TopicTitle: stock parts and edited stock parts.

Articles.Content:
hello there,

first of all i don't know if this post is in the right place. sorry about that if it isn't

i seem to have a problem. i made some edited stock parts myself and KSP recognizes them. but when i launch the rocket or plane or just that edited part it changes to its "predecessor" (unedited stock part).

it does not differ if it resize it or make an engine stronger or anything at all. it will go back to its normal state.

is there a way to stop this from happening?

see you in kspace
